column4: it wasn't actually too bad getting my comp hooked up in the other room but the wired network wont even work!
can you try that dhclient thingie ?
ok, I plugged the wire into eth0 then ran sudo dhclient eth0.... the result is similar to before - anything specific u are looking for?
you should get a line that says .. connected to blah blah ... with ip so and so
no working leases in perisstent database
hmm get that .. you wires etc god ?
i tried different wires and different ports on the router just in case
i also rebooted with the wire connected, just in case
Ah .. iteresting ... I am lost man :(
its a gangster new evga motherboard for the core I7 cpu - maybe not yet properly supported?
it shld have come up ... I mean u shld recive a dhcp address ...but ..one last try .. can you try sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
i really appreciate all the help man - maybe try the motherboard driver from the provided cd thru ndiswrapper??
